name: 2 or 3-Seater Sofa
description:

However, the couple still needs a comfortable sofa. As the most commonly used seating area, their current sofa is unusable, and replacing it is vital for their daily comfort and well-being. 
We are seeking kind donations to provide:

A sofa that can seat at least three people, offering them a clean, relaxing space.

Your generosity can help transform their home into a space of dignity and comfort. 
Please contact me @ 8518 3526 if you are interested to donate/help.
Fumigation is expected to start end Jan/early Feb 2025, therefore the addition of the sofa during that time would be perfect.

      1.    Enhanced Safety: Preventing accidental falls during sleep or positional changes.
      2.    Improved Mobility Support: Offering stability when sitting up or getting in and out of bed.
      3.    Peace of Mind: Providing reassurance to both the individual and their caregivers regarding safety.

I believe this device would significantly improve their quality of life and reduce the risk of injury.
